ValidationRule.description: The group plan sponsor for Premera BC leads must be Premera FEP
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c , "Premera BC of Washington"), Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Premera FEP", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Call Request" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The group plan sponsor for Premera BC of Washington leads must be Premera FEP
